parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.82</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enable or disable pixel precision (rounding) in a given control interface. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> controlName [[ctrlSetPixelPrecision]] mode </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> controlName: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> mode: [[Number]] or [[String]] - can be one of the following:
* 0 / "AUTO" - control position (x,y,w,h) is always rounded to whole pixels (game default)
* 1 / "ON" - control position (x,y,w,h) is rounded to whole pixels only when not animating
* 2 / "OFF" - control position (x,y,w,h) is always precise, no pixel rounding applies here </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlSetPixelPrecision]] 2; <template><title>codecomment</title><part><name index="1"/><value>// Enables pixel precision of the given control</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
___________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[ctrlCommit]], [[ctrlCreate]], [[ctrlDelete]], [[ctrlModel]], [[ctrlSetModel]], [[ctrlPosition]], [[ctrlClassName]], [[displayCtrl]], [[ctrlModelScale]], [[ctrlSetModelScale]], [[ctrlModelDirAndUp]], [[ctrlSetModelDirAndUp]], [[ctrlSetPosition]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
